title: Friendly sans serif humanist
content:
Museo is one of the fonts. What is the other font? It looks like Ronnia – bit it's not!

Solved By: 

 [akira1975](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317154649/http:/typophile.com/user/4504 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Unknown-4.jpeg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317154649/http:/typophile.com/files/Unknown-4.jpeg) | 181.23 KB |
author: yoshimura

comments.content: Sorry, just read your comment about already knowing Museo.

Thanks akira!  
Does anyone have recommendation for something similar to BNPP Sans? I really like the descender on the 'f' and the spur on the 'c'.  
I can think of Ronnia and Precious sans, but… it's gotta get closer than those!

Rambla seems closest to me.

But some elements of BNPP Sans also remind me of:  
– [Air](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317154649/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/family/air/All/All/Bestsellers/2?&fg=000000&bg=ffffff&sample_size=35&sample_text=Roland%20Garros%20successif&ft=liga)  
– [Bureau Grot](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317154649/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/font_bureau/bureau_grot_condensed_book_ot/opentype_cff/?&fg=000000&bg=ffffff&sample_size=50&sample_text=Roland%20Garros%20successif&ft=liga&acs_pt=32)  
– [Good](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317154649/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/family/ff_good/?&fg=000000&bg=ffffff&sample_size=12&sample_text=Roland%20Garros%20successif&ft=liga)  
– [Kohinoor](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317154649/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/indian_type_foundry/kohinoor_latin_complete_ot/?&fg=000000&bg=ffffff&sample_size=35&sample_text=Roland%20Garros%20successif&ft=liga)  
– [Mellnik Text](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317154649/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/family/mellnik_text/?&fg=000000&bg=ffffff&sample_size=36&sample_text=Roland%20Garros%20successif&ft=liga)  
– [Supria Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317154649/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/family/supria_sans/All/All/Bestsellers/3?&fg=000000&bg=ffffff&sample_size=30&sample_text=Roland%20Garros%20successif&ft=liga)  
– [Vista Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317154649/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/family/vista_sans/?&fg=000000&bg=ffffff&sample_size=12&sample_text=Roland%20Garros%20successif&ft=liga)

Have a look if any of them is to your liking!
